game_description: This is an exciting VR moba game. You will fight in a medieval fantasy village as a magic hero. This game is only a demo now. It will be gradually improved. More game contents and maps will comming soon.
review_1: Cute location but the game itself was really dull, the actions you could make were not very responsive and became rather repetitive
review_2: Game looks pretty promising. It is really easy to check the map and your skills cooldowns. I loved the idea setting up high-grounds for ambush and other stuff. I am hoping those forests will also contain neutral monsters and would love to test them also.
